definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
perfect and without blemish/flawless/to leave nothing to be desired

sentences.english: This feels like the perfect place for me right now.
sentences.chinese: 這種感覺就像那個完美的地方對我一樣。

sentences.english: The cold overall tone in the image is brilliantly accompanied by the golden in the grass and on the towers.
sentences.chinese: 畫中整體的冷色調連同金黃的草與塔尖，堪稱完美。

sentences.english: What if I saw myself as perfect?
sentences.chinese: 假如我已經將自己看作完美的呢？

sentences.english: He is perfect as the sensitive but strong reporter.
sentences.chinese: 他把一個敏感而言詞犀利的記者演得完美無缺。

sentences.english: Most cases seldom present examples of absolutely perfect or totally flawed systems.
sentences.chinese: 大部份的個案鮮有絕對完美或一無可取的情況。

sentences.english: Orson: Yes, but actors want opening night to be perfect. That's why they rehearse.
sentences.chinese: 我們都希望我們的新婚之夜是完美的。

sentences.english: They're perfect for closing open plastic bags, such as rice bags.
sentences.chinese: 它們也是修復塑料袋開口的完美選擇，比如米袋。

sentences.english: What a perfect representation of performative sex.
sentences.chinese: 這是性行爲的完美闡釋。

sentences.english: Then reality becomes a perfect model that the order of all the forms entangles in integration.
sentences.chinese: 現實也變成了所有糾纏於一體的形式秩序的完美模型。

sentences.english: A perfect platform for educating new team members about what the solution entails.
sentences.chinese: 對新團隊成員進行有關解決方案需求教育的完美平臺。

sentences.english: It is simply impossible to play StarCraft perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 顯然要把星際玩到完美幾乎是不可能的。

sentences.english: She is the most beautiful and perfect ladyboy in Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 她是泰國最完美的變性女孩。

sentences.english: Keep quality first, hanker for perfection.
sentences.chinese: 保持品質第一，追求完美。

sentences.english: Classic German-style flavor, a perfect cherry and strawberry cake.
sentences.chinese: 徳式傳統經典風味，酒釀櫻桃的完美呈現。

sentences.english: The local superstitions regarding the dead were the perfect cover for Evazan's project.
sentences.chinese: 當地對死亡的迷信爲埃瓦讚的項目提供了完美的掩護。

sentences.english: Perfect husbands switch careers in their mid-50’s.
sentences.chinese: 完美的丈夫在50幾歲換工作。

definition: perfect and without blemish/flawless/to leave nothing to be desired
to be in defiance of the natural order
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
can be rated as/can be said to be
